tnc_card.action1: If you have this, upload a picture
tnc_card.text1: You will need a TNC Card from the City Transportation Office. If you have this, upload a picture here:
tnc_card.text2: View new driver instructions here which include steps on how to obtain one.

driverRegistration.description: Thank you for choosing to drive with RideAustin. To qualify, drivers are required to be 21 years of age and have vehicles that are:
driverRegistration.newCarSuccessMessage: After completing the next steps, check your email for further instructions..
